_header: As Jesu went throughout the land
_description: Gospel for Wednesday after Third Sunday in Lent, in ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: Als ihesu crist went thurghout þe landPrecheand to folk þat he fand…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þat files noght aman with inffor in þat dede he dose no syn
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Accesserunt ad ihesum ab ierosolimis.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iiii post dominicam iii quadragesime Secundum Matheum (rubric, f. 49rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.71-74
